extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the product and version in use are affected by the vulnerability by checking the product name and version number against the impacted versions list.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the product affected by the vulnerability?
Which product category does the affected product belong to?
Is updating the product to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Update Product to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected product to the latest version as specified in the fixed versions list to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Deactivate SAML-based SSO Configuration
extracted_playbook.description: As a temporary measure, deactivate the SAML-based SSO configuration for the affected product until an update can be performed.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Product to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the affected product to the latest version as specified in the fixed versions list to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Remote Monitoring and Management (RMM): 10.1.40 and below
